resources:
//titles, subtitles and headers Earthquake Alert Dashboard About Settings 10.0 Incoming Earthquake EARTHQUAKE ALERT! //content resources Recent Earthquakes The Earthquake Alert app is part of a thesis project on Rapid Earthquake Estimation and Alert System. This research aims to develop a system that is able to disseminate real-time alerts for earthquakes. The application is currently under development and under testing. The goal of this system and android application is to be able to give its users a few seconds (at least 10 seconds) of warning time to its users. For more information, inquiries, comments, suggestions and reviews, please contact us anytime!
Basic features include: PH Earthquake Events Feed and Earthquake Alerts Refresh Settings
